Disclosures under Stewardship Code 
 
With the objective to improve governance of Investee Companies and ultimately the 
return on investment of insurers, the Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority 
of India issued the Guidelines on Stewardship Code for Insurers in India vide circular 
dated March 20, 2017 (Stewardship Guidelines). 
 
The Stewardship Guidelines broadly requires the insurers to have a policy as regards the 
engagement with the management of the Investee Companies, their conduct at the general 
meetings, exercise of voting rights on shareholder resolutions
